content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone-furnace with a burner-inserter at position (53.5, -78.5) that is connected to a transport-belt at position (53.5, -79.5)

### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a standalone stone-furnace

### BeltGroup at position (51.5, -84.5) to (53.5, -78.5)
Consists of 7 belts that form a transport system, with inputs from the west and outputs to the north

### Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a single wooden chest with no connections

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has produced the item you are trying to extract
- Check that the furnace is not empty and has the item you want to extract

### Errors when inserting into a furnace
- Make sure the furnace has enough space to insert the item
- Check that the item you are trying to insert is compatible with the furnace

### Errors when inserting into a full inventory
- Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to insert an item
- Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the item

### NAMESPACE
* Utility functions:
	+ extract_item: used to extract items from entities, but has failed due to empty furnaces
	+ insert_item: used to insert items into entities, but has failed due to full inventories
* Important variables:
	+ furnace: a stone-furnace entity
	+ burner_inserter: a burner-inserter entity
	+ transport_belt: a transport-belt entity
	+ coal: a resource item
	+ iron_plate: a resource item
	+ iron_ore: a resource item
	+ wood: a resource item
	+ stone: a resource item
	+ transport_belt: a transport-belt entity
	+ burner_inserter: a burner-inserter entity
	+ furnace: a stone-furnace entity
